actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to retire coal preference right lease applications for which the Secretary has made an affirmative commercial quantities determination, to substitute certain land selections of the Navajo Nation, to designate certain wilderness areas, and for other purposes.
short_title: San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

titles.title: San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act
San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to retire coal preference right lease applications for which the Secretary has made an affirmative commercial quantities determination, to substitute certain land selections of the Navajo Nation, to designate certain wilderness areas, and for other purposes.
San Juan County Settlement Implementation Act
